entries.Introduction: %You meet a very large, fair skinned young woman with long, amethyst colored hair.#$b#% She's wearing a relatively tiny turquoise spaghetti-string tank top.#$b#% In actuality, on a normal sized woman the garment would likely seem very large.#$b#%She is also wearing a purple mini-skirt, held up by a thin, metallic chain belt. #$b#%Though with her wide hips and relatively thin waist, the belt is likely more fashion than function.#$b#%Setting aside her choice of clothing for a moment...#$b#%It is impossible to avoid how musclebound this girl is.#$b#%The thin layer of fat adorning her bulging muscles makes her look that much more massive.#$b#%Her skimpy clothes do little to hide that fact, and her impressive breasts are packed tightly into her top, forming deep cleavage.#$b#%The pecs beneath are just as impressive; they look thick, and powerful.#$b#%Possibly more amazing still, are her immense traps, that are close to reaching her earlobes.#$b#...Ahem?$6#$b#You know, I don't mind you admiring my admittedly awesome bod...$0#$b# But we should probably at least introduce ourselves first...*giggle*$0#$b#I'm Abigail, - but my friends call me Abby!$1#$b#And you are...?$0#$b# @, huh? Oh, that's right... I heard someone new was moving onto that old farm.$0#$b#It's kind of a shame, really. I always enjoyed exploring those overgrown fields by myself.$3#$b#It was the perfect place to workout without anyone bothering me.#$b#Welp, I'm sure you'll put it to good use!$1
entries.danceRejection: If I stepped on your foot by mistake, it might put you in the hospital, so...$2#$b#No thanks...$2
entries.divorced: What are you doing here? Just leave me alone!$a
entries.secondChance_Girls: *sigh*... I can't stay mad at you anymore, @. Let's just move on with our lives.$s
entries.breakUp: Oh... I... I understand. You see me as just a friend...$s#$b#I guess we weren't really a good match...$s
entries.Mon: Oh, hey. Taking a break from work?#$b#I still have to finish my workout, so I'll let you get back to it.
entries.Mon2: Oh, hi.#$b#Sometimes after I'm done working out for the day, I go and chill out at the graveyard.$0#$b#My parents don't bother me as much when I'm there.$3
entries.Mon4: BAM!$13#$b#*giggle* Sorry @, just enjoying a little flexing.$1#$b#Maybe it's a bit narcissistic, but I can't help but admire myself some times.$0#$b#I worked really hard to get here, so I should enjoy it, right?
entries.Mon6: %Abigail's lost in thought.#$b#%She seems to be in a good mood today. She's humming what seems to be the theme to an action movie.#$b#%She hasn't noticed you yet. You gently tap her on her bulging shoulder.#$b#*Gasp*!!$7#$b#Oh geez @, you startled the heck out of me!$10#$b#*giggle* So what did you want?$1#$b#Me? Oh I was just thinking about what it'd be like to be an action star.#$b#I mean think about it, how cool would it be to see a super buff female lead in an action flick?$8#$b#Or maybe sci-fi would be more fun...$3
entries.Mon8: 'Sup @?$1#$b# I was hoping I'd run into you today.#$b#You're always making time to come see me, even when you're running yourself ragged with that farm of yours.$4#$b#Guess I just wanted to put it out there that I noticed, and say thanks.$4#$b#*giggle*Don't start blushing or you're going to get me blushing too!$1
entries.Tue: Ugh... I'm not in a good mood right now.$s#$e#I said I'm not in a good mood... what do you want?$a
entries.Tue2: ...*sigh*...$s#$e#I know my parents mean well, but sometimes they just can't understand my point of view.$3#$b# Maybe if they ever worked out for real...$3
entries.Tue4: %You set aside a moment to take in Abigail's immense figure.#$b#%There isn't an inch of her body that isn't large and powerful looking.#$b#%So much so that were she to flex enough, she could easily burst out of her clothing.#$b#%You'd be lying if you said you wouldn't like to see that though.#$b#Hey @.$0#$b#One of these days you're going to get used to me being an amazonian country girl. *laugh*.$1#$b#Truth be told I'm still getting used to it, myself.$0#$b#Of course, my parents haven't either...$3
entries.Tue6: Oh heya, @!$1#$b#Don't mind me, just being awesome!$1#$b#Set a new max on my bench press today. My pecs are really feeling it!$8#$b#I've earned a nice relaxing rest after that.$0#$b#Say, since we've become friends, maybe you could come by and spot me next time?$1
entries.Tue8: Geez, I'm starving! I feel like I could eat a cow!$1#$b#What's with that look?$0#$b#I need all the carbs and protein I can get my hands on to fuel these babies!$13#$b#Hey... you wanna give them a feel?$11#$b#%Abigail flexes her bicep, and motions for you to come feel. #$b#%You reservedly place your hand on the engorged sphere. One hand is barely enough to grab the entire muscle.#$b#%The first thing you notice is just how warm her skin is, heated by the vast amount of blood powering her muscles.#$b#Go on! Really sink your fingers in!$13#$b#%You do as you're told and attempt to squeeze her bicep.#$b#%Despite being covered in a soft layer of flesh, the muscle underneath is rock hard. You try in vain to dent it. You're just not strong enough.#$b#*giggle* Pretty awesome right?$13#$b#Okay, show's over!$1#$b#Time to find some food, pronto!$1
entries.Wed: Hey. Sorry in advance if I say anything rude. I haven't eaten in a bit, and I get cranky when I don't eat.$3#$e#What do you want?$6
entries.Wed2: Say, have you ever played a game called 'Dragon Stalker'?#$b# It's super cool!$1#$b#It's about a group of 4 warriors - the 'stalkers' who go out and hunt down these enormous dragons!$8#$b#I'm a huge fan of the main character Raz.$0#$b#She's this super buff amazonian huntress who wears a black cloak and wields a huge greatsword!$1#$b#I've been working on a costume based on her design. Emily is helping me!$1
entries.Wed4: Hey there!#$b#You know I've been meaning to ask...$3#$b#You must do a lot of heavy lifting on your farm, yeah?#$b#It must be tough. With you being so skinny and all...$2#$b#No offense!$10#$b#I guess I worded that poorly...$2#$b# But what I'm trying to get at is...$3#$b#If you ever want to bulk up, I could show you the ropes you know?$4#$b#In case you hadn't noticed, I'm pretty good at it...$13
entries.Wed6: %Abigail is repeatedly flexing her immense bicep.#$b#%Each time she curls her thick arm, you swear the peak of her bicep reaches even higher than the last.#$b#%Then with a grunt, she puts much more effort into her flex, her hand trembling as she slowly brings her arm up.#$b#%The sight is awe inspiring.#$b#% Her enormous engorged bicep head peaks even higher than before, until it is just shy of reaching her hand.#$b#%Abigail - still holding her flex, uncurls her hand and allows her slim fingers to rest on the peak of her bicep.#$b#%She takes a moment to let her fingers probe the bulging muscle for any signs of weakness, but there are none.#$b#...I see you over there, @.$13#$b#Next time I'm going to charge you tickets.$13#$b#To the gun show!$8#$b#...Sorry that was pretty lame! *laughs*$1
entries.Wed8: Gotta make sure to visit Maru some time soon.$3#$b#She's amazing.$1#$b#She gives me everything I need to keep my body growing.$13#$b#I've followed all of her instructions to the letter, and I haven't had any nasty side effects at all.$13#$b#Aside from making me really horny right after a good workout.$3#$b#...$6#$b#Wow, I just kinda blurted that out, huh? *nervous giggle*$12#$b#Ahem! Let's forget I said anything, okay?$1
entries.Thu2: Hey.#$b#Thinking of eating like, a big ham or something.#$b#Whenever I see someone eating a big chunk of meat right off of the bone in fiction, it just looks so good, doesn't it? *giggle*$1
entries.Thu4: So tell me, @... Why'd you decide to become a farmer?#$b#...#$b#'To escape the doldrums of a minimum wage office job', huh?$10#$b#I guess I can relate to that. I can't stand living in a home with so many rules.$3#$b#I guess it's part of what got me into bodybuilding.$3#$b#My parents certainly hated it- which was a plus in my book.$3#$b# Maybe they still do, I dunno.#$b#They try not to acknowledge that their sweet baby girl is built like a linebacker.$2#$b#Too bad for them, 'cause I love it, and I'm never going back.$13
entries.Thu6: You know, sometimes I think back to what it was like to be frail.$3#$b#It feels like a whole different life.$3#$b#I guess that's why they call it a lifestyle change, huh?#$b#Maybe me and the other girls make it look easy.#$b#But this life is a constant battle.#$b# A battle against the weakness inside of yourself.$6#$b#I didn't mean to get deep there, sorry.$10
entries.Thu8: %You approach Abigail, and you notice that she looks unsteady on her feet.#$b#%You reach out to her just as she is about to stumble, and she accepts your help.#$b#%She leans her meaty arm on your shoulder.#$b#%Her face is flush, and her breathing is quick and heavy.#$b#%Abigail's dark hair is matted to her forehead with sweat, which is beading around her brow.#$b#%You feel an intense heat radiating from her.#$b#%Being this close to her and feeling her warmth is somewhat intoxicating.#$b#*pant* Th...thanks, @. *pant* I got way too into my workout *pant*.$6#$b#I think I overdid it...*pant* my whole body feels like jelly...$2#$b#But thankfully you were here to catch me. $1#$b#...$11#$b#You know I wouldn't mind staying like this for a bit...$4#$b#That is if you can put up with me smelling like sweat!$1
entries.Fri: Hmmm... Fridays are chest days.$3#$b#Maybe I'll go with extra flys.$3#$b#...Can I help you with something?$4
entries.Fri2: It's cute that the older ladies gather to do aerobics, but I wish we had a proper gym, you know?$0#$b#One with a smoothie bar...
entries.Fri4: Sometimes I swear Haley must inject whatever she can find into her body.$3#$b#I mean have you seen her? How is she so much bigger than anyone else here?!$6#$b#I mean I take Maru's injections, sure...$3#$b#But Haley's STILL always ahead!$4#$b#It's just frustrating.$6#$b#I mean I wanna get bigger. And trust me, I will.$0#$b#But I've come too far to risk my health for quick gains...$0
entries.Fri6: Maru says I'm in perfect condition!$1#$b#Maaaybe I could stand to slim down a tad to bring out some more definition.$3#$b#But I like the way I look. I feel healthier this way, you know?#$b#Plus I like still having the girls.$8
entries.Fri8: Just in time!$1#$b#I knew you'd be coming by to hang out at some point or another.#$b# So I figured I'd try to wrap my pre-workout and get Maru to do my injections early.#$b#So ummm...$3#$b#...$4#$b#I've noticed that you like my muscles quite a bit.$11#$b#Is it like... a festish thing?$12#$b#...$4#$b#Oh my god! I'm so sorry, @! I'm not usually like this!$7#$b#My libido kinda kicks into overdrive after an injection.$2#$b#Your sexual tastes are none of my business!$10#$b#...And I probably shouldn't have blurted about my sex drive either, *giggle*.$1#$b#But you know... I wouldn't mind if that were your thing.$4#$b#Muscular girls I mean...$4
entries.Sat: The fresh mountain air is nice on a day like this.$h#$e#I wonder if the frogs will make an appearance soon.
entries.Sat2: Ugh...$2#$b#Thought it would be a good idea to double up on my protein shake today.$3#$b#Turns out it's not... urp...$2
entries.Sat4: It's the weekend, so my online buddies are usually available.$0#$b#I still have some working out to do before I hop on to my computer though.$0#$b#Oh yeah, we should exchange online IDs some time!$1
entries.Sat6: God I just feel so jacked right now!$13#$b#A good pump will do that to you, but today... I dunno.$13#$b#I feel like I'm catching up on Haley!$8
entries.Sat8: %Abigail is massaging her swollen deltoid.#$b#%Each time her hand rotates to rub the pumpkin sized muscle, the cords that make up her thick forearms skip and dance.#$b#%She looks mildly frustrated.#$b#Ugh...$3#$b#Oh, @! Perfect timing, as usual.$10#$b#Any chance I could get you to give my shoulders a massage?$6#$b#It's actually getting harder and harder to reach them properly.$3#$b#Thanks!$1#$b#...*rub* *rub*...#$b#Wow... that feels fantastic...*giggle*$1#$b#...*rub* *rub*...$11#$b#...*moan*.$12#$b#*gasp*!! Sorry, I didn't mean to make a weird noise!$10#$b#My voice just kinda slipped out...$10#$b#You're, um... Pretty good with your hands...$11
entries.Sun: I have to write a paper by tonight...$2#$b# But I just did forearms and typing feels weird now...$2
entries.Sun2: I wonder what would happen if I spent all night in the graveyard?#$q 17/18 Sun_old#@, What do you think happens to us after we die?#$r 17 0 Sun_17#I have no idea.#$r 18 40 Sun_18#We come back as spooky ghosts.#$r 17 0 Sun_17#We go to Heaven.#$r 18 0 Sun_17#Our energy bodies enter the astral plane.#$r 17 30 Sun_nothing#Nothing. We just cease to exist.
entries.Sun_old: $p 17#I guess you think nothing would happen, right?$u|Maybe a wicked ghost would appear!
entries.Sun_nothing: You know, that wouldn't be so bad.$1
entries.Sun4: Would it surprise you to know, that I'm taking college courses on top of bodybuilding?#$b#I'm a lit major, but I take a few other classes here and there.#$b#Bodybuilding is more of a hobby slash lifestyle for me. I don't really plan on it being my career.$3
entries.Sun6: I'm kinda on cloud nine right now!$1#$b#Got a really good score on my paper, and got a new max on a few of my lifts!$1#$b#Hmm? What'd I end up writing about?$10#$b#Well, remember our talk about the graveyard?$0#$b#I wrote about the afterlife, and how different cultures perceive death.$6#$b#So thanks for the inspiration.$4
entries.Sun8: %Abigail hasn't noticed you yet.#$b#%You watch in awe as she leans down into a mighty crab flex.#$b#%Every inch of her upper body swells with her amazing effort.#$b#%Her neck seems to disappear, swallowed by her hungry traps.#$b#%Her meaty pecs tense, and lock into place. #$b#% This causes her breasts to spread apart, despite being pressed into her massive arms, which frame her chest.#$b#%She giggles, obviously enjoying the sensation of being a muscle bound amazon.#$b#Oh, @! Hey there, don't mind me!$1#$b#I was just feeling especially pumped today, couldn't resist a big flex!$13#$b#There's nothing in the world quite like it...$4
entries.Event_VideoGame_Yes: Great! I'm sure you'll be able to beat this level with ease.$h
entries.Event_VideoGame_No: Oh? *sigh*... I guess I'll never get past this level, then...$s
entries.Event_Grave1: See? You understand why I'm out here, then.#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've spent so much time building my body.#$b#I want to use these muscles for something other than pumping iron!$3#$b#Like wielding a massive sword, and slaying ancient evil monsters!$8
entries.Event_Grave2: Sure. I'm not exactly in it just for the kill.$3#$b#I just want to do a little exploring and maybe bring back some cool treasure!#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$0
entries.Event_Grave3: Oh, it's because I'm a girl... isn't it? Ugh...$u^Why? I'm obviously way stronger than you!$a#$b#I'm not some fragile princess.. I can take care of myself!$a#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$0
entries.Event_Grave4: Really? That's surprising.$0#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've spent so much time building my body.#$b#I want to use these muscles for something other than pumping iron!$3#$b#Like wielding a massive sword, and slaying ancient evil monsters!$8
entries.Event_Rain_2: Yea... I guess you would be one to appreciate this somber ambience.
entries.Event_Tragic_1: Yeah... I guess my own life is okay...$s
entries.Event_Tragic_3: I would feel better if I could believe that...#$b#But I don't.$s
entries.Event_Cave_1: That's sweet, and I know it comes from a good place.$1#$b#But I don't want to be babied.$3
entries.Event_Cave_2: I guess when you have something...#$b#...Someone to lose, it's normal to be afraid...$4
entries.summer_1: Summer's here. It's not really my favorite season.#$e#Working out in the heat is a huge chore.
entries.summer_Mon: My pet guinea pig, David, just hates this hot weather. He's fussy.
entries.summer_Tue: A vanilla protein shake would really hit the spot on a hot day like today.#$b#But...I already had one, best not to over do it.
entries.summer_Wed: No matter how light I dress, I still end up too hot this time of year.#$b#It's a real pain because I burn easily too.$3
entries.summer_6: Sometimes I sneak out to the beach at night.#$b#I don't do too well in the sun, and to be honest, It's nice to be able to relax alone.#$b#Plus it's a pain having people gawk over me when I'm wearing a bikini.$8
entries.summer_Thu: I bet exploring in the caves would be perfect on a hot day like today.$3#$b# It's probably nice and cool in there.#$b#Working up a sweat slaying slimes sounds more fun, too. *giggle*.
entries.summer_Thu4: Part of me thinks getting a tan would be awesome.#$b#I'm sure it'd make my muscles look better.#$b#But I burn too easily.$3#$b$Plus I kinda dig being this pale.
entries.summer_Fri: God I love a good pump.#$b#Every now and again, my gains feel less substantial.#$b#But then on days like today, I feel MASSIVE!$13#$b#.
entries.summer_Sat: I'm looking forward to fall... the cool mountain breeze, the swirling red petals, the smell of mushrooms... *sigh*
entries.summer_Sun: Do you ever get an urge to go exploring, @?#$q 25/26 summer_Sun_old#Okay... pretend you just won a free vacation. Where would you go?#$r 25 0 Sun_25#The beach#$r 26 30 Sun_26#In a dark cave#$r 26 30 Sun_26#The old, gnarled forest#$r 25 0 Sun_25#Joja Mega-Mall
entries.summer_Sun_old: $p 25#I do... but you probably wouldn't like the places I'm thinking about...|Maybe we'll be neighbors someday. I think we both have similar, weird tastes.$h
entries.Sun_25: Huh. I think that would get old fast.
entries.summer_Wed2: I would give just about anything to have my own place.$3#$b#No parents to nag you, room to express yourself...#$b#I bet you love that farmhouse. It seems like the perfect place to live.
entries.summer_Tue4: Ugh... these straps are really digging into my traps...$3#$b#Maybe it means I've made some gains recently!$1
entries.summer_Sat6: I'm actually enjoying myself this summer.$h#$e#Before I started bodybuilding, I'd just shut myself indoors during summer.
entries.summer_Mon8: I used to think Pelican Town was kinda drab, but lately I'm starting to love some things about it.$1#$b#It's certainly missing a proper gym.$3#$b#But I got to meet you!$1#$b#I'm really glad, by the way.$4
entries.summer_Thu10: %Abigail notices you approaching.#$b#%You can tell that she's in a good mood.#$b#%For some reason though she doesn't quite make eye contact with you.#$b#%Her cheeks are blushing a deep red.#$b#Oh hey, @.$12#$b#I kinda had a dream about you last night.$4#$b#We were in the old west, a pair of sheriffs.$4#$b#After we had just fought off a gang of bandits, we returned to the station where no one could bother us.#$b#Then we...$4#$b#...*blush*$12#$b#*ahem*!$10#$b#A-anyway... How's it going?$1
entries.summer_Fri10: Do you ever get lonely on your farm?$4#$b#We could hang out there sometime, if you'd like.$4#$b#the privacy would be nice...$11
entries.fall_1: Ah... Fall's here!$h#$e#I was getting so tired of summer.
entries.fall_Mon: This cool weather makes me wanna do more cardio...
entries.fall_Tue: $d joja#I try to help out in the shop on most days. Business has been pretty bad since the Joja Mart opened, though.|Ever since Joja Mart shut down we've been doing great at the shop!$h
entries.fall_Wed: I was thinking of painting my shoulders to look like pumpkins for the Spirit's Even festival this year.#$b#I bet the kids would dig it!$1
entries.fall_Thu: #$1 AbigailHAND#Last night I dreamt that my left hand had turned into a gigantic %noun. Does that mean anything?#$e#%Abigail doesn't seem to be interested in talking right now.
entries.fall_Sat: $d cc#I can't believe you fixed up that old Community Center all by yourself. I'm really impressed.|Do you have any scarecrows on your farm?
entries.fall_Sun: Hmm... what should I do tonight?#$q 27/28 fall_Sun_old#I was thinking about dyeing my hair again... what do you think?#$r 27 10 Sun_27#Dye it black.#$r 27 10 Sun_27#Why not blonde?#$r 27 20 Sun_WildColor#How about bubblegum pink?#$r 28 0 Sun_28#I like your hair just the way it is!
entries.fall_Sun_old: $p 27#I was going to dye my hair but then I decided against it.|Yes? What is it?
entries.Sun_27: I guess that's a pretty safe choice, huh?#$e#I'll think about it.
entries.Sun_28: Of course that's what you'd say.$u
entries.Sun_WildColor: You're always good for a laugh.$h
entries.fall_Wed2: Are you growing pumpkins on your farm this year?#$e#Save one for me!$h
entries.fall_Tue4: I may fight with my parents a lot, but I know they're just looking out for me. They're doing what they think is best.$s#$b#I dunno why I'm saying this to you. Don't tell anyone.$4
entries.fall_Sat6: @, you always manage to look so nice.#$b#I wonder how you do that AND run a farm.$3#$b#I look like a mess after a workout!$1
entries.fall_Mon8: You know, I could actually see myself becoming a farmer some day...#$b#I bet all of this brawn would come in handy.$13#$b#But how would that ever happen? *giggle*$l2
entries.fall_Thu10: I had an interesting dream last night, with you in it.#$e#It was a good dream.$h
entries.fall_Fri6: *moan*$12#$b#Oh... geez!$10#$b#Sorry @. I just got my injections from maru.#$b#And well... You know what they do to me.$4
entries.fall_Fri10: I usually feel lonely this time of year, but not anymore.$l#$e#@, I'm so glad that I met you.#$b#I hope we get to spend a lot of falls together!$1
entries.winter_1: Well, fall is over...$s#$e#But I like winter, too!$h
entries.winter_Mon: It's just too cold to go outside much.#$e#But I do enjoy building a snowgoon.$h
entries.winter_Tue: Doesn't a steaming hot cocoa flavored protein shake sound good right now?
entries.winter_Wed: Hi. Is it boring to be a farmer during the winter?
entries.spring_12: I'm definitely going to enter the egg hunt tomorrow. Are you?
entries.spring_23: Well, tomorrow is the flower dance.#$b#Dancing is alright, but there's no way my dress still fits...$3
entries.winter_7: I'm going to build a buff snow woman!$1
entries.fall_26: Will I see you tomorrow at the Spirit's Eve festival? Look for me in the haunted maze.$h
entries.summer_10: Everyone's excited for the Luau tomorrow.#$b#I'm just looking forward to pigging out!$1#$b#I usually have to watch my diet, so it'll be nice to cut loose.
entries.summer_27: You can't miss tomorrow's festival. It's one of the most beautiful wonders of the valley.
entries.winter_24: I'm going to eat so much cranberry sauce tomorrow.$h
entries.winter_Thu: Another year is almost over.#$e#It goes by so fast, doesn't it?$s
entries.winter_Fri: One thing I've learned living here... everyone stares at you if you look different.
entries.winter_Sat: It's the weekend!#$e#That means I can play twice as many video games.$h#$e#Bye.
entries.winter_Sun: Oh, hello.#$q 29/30 winter_Sun_old#I made these two drawings. What do you think?#$r 29 20 Sun_29#I like the jungle island and the tiger.#$r 30 5 Sun_30#I like the orc with the battleaxe.#$r 29 -50 Sun_Bad#I don't like either of them.
entries.winter_Sun_old: $p 29#Remember those drawings I showed you a while ago? I accidentally threw them away.$s|Remember that drawing I showed you with the orc? I entered it into an online contest and won 50g!$h
entries.Sun_29: Oh yeah? I guess that makes sense.
entries.Sun_30: I'm glad. It's embarrassing to share your art with others. But I think you and I are on the same page.
entries.Sun_Bad: Rude! Why would you hurt my feelings like that? You're so insensitive!$s
entries.winter_Wed2: Hi. If you're ever bored, you can always hang out in my room.#$b#I might be working out though, so...$3#$b#If you can put up with that, than you're always welcome!$1
entries.winter_Tue4: Hey bud!$1#$b#Sure is cold out...$3#$b#let's split a hot cocoa shake later!$h
entries.winter_Sat6: I've been daydreaming a lot lately...#$e#Oh! You want to know what it's about? Well...$u#$b#...It's a secret.$h
entries.winter_Thu10: Another year is almost over...#$b#But I'm looking forward to what a fresh year together will be like...$4
entries.winter_Wed6: It must be nice not having crops to worry about this time of year.#$e#And that means you can hang out with me more often!$h
entries.winter_Fri10: %Abigail is doing her best not to look cold.#$b#%Even with so much mass, it's understandable that she'd be chilly, given ehr choice of attire.#$b#H-hey, @!$1#$b#Sure is a cold one today, huh?#$b#...$4#$b#You know, we could always go hang out in my room...$4#$b#I have this really awesome heated blanket!$1#$b#It's a king sized since.... well you know...$4#$b#Anyway, I bet we'd both fit under it!$1

Entries.abigail_lift_weights: %Abigail is curling a hefty looking dumbell.#$b#%Her concentration and smooth fluid motions are admirable, not to say anything of the incredible strength on display.#$b#%You wonder how long it must have taken for her to become this way, how much dedication she must have built along side her body.#$b#Let me finish this set, then I'll be free to talk...$6

We're letting you live here free of charge until you finish school. It seems like you don't appreciate that at all!$u"/emote Abigail 12/speak Abigail "Stop trying to make me feel guilty.$a#$b#I appreciate that you and Dad are helping me out, but expecting me to dress the way you want is ridiculous.$a#$b#I'm not a little girl anymore, Mom.$u"/faceDirection Caroline 1/pause 1500/faceDirection Caroline 3/speak Caroline "...You're right. I was fighting with my Mom earlier.$s"

Entries.4/f Abigail 1500/t 2100 2400/w sunny: nightTime/-4442 39/farmer 47 95 0 Abigail 47 87 0 Pierre 52 91 3/skippable/addLantern 735 46 86 1/specificTemporarySprite abbyGraveyard/faceDirection Abigail 2/animate Abigail false true 500 24 27/viewport 47 87 true/pause 4000/move farmer 0 -4 0/pause 500/animate Abigail false false 150 24 25 24 26 0/pause 700/stopAnimation Abigail 0/pause 1500/emote farmer 8/pause 600/animate Abigail false true 100 28 29/pause 1200/stopAnimation Abigail/pause 500/playMusic echos/speak Abigail "I guess you're wondering why I'm in the graveyard at this hour..."/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 400/speak Abigail "Well, I'm here because it's the best place in town to find some privacy."/pause 500/emote Abigail 40/pause 250/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 400/speak Abigail "And I'm all sweaty because I've been practicing my swordsmanship.$4"/emote farmer 16/pause 400/faceDirection Abigail 2/pause 300/speak Abigail "Hey! What... you think girls can't be warriors?$a"/pause 300/faceDirection Abigail 3/pause 500/faceDirection Abigail 2/speak Abigail "Sorry, I guess I'm getting a little defensive.$3#$b#You see, I want to explore the mountain caves...$3#$b#I've got the muscle to do it too...$2#$b#It's just, well. I lack the experince, you know?"/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak Abigail "$q 847951 null#You've used a sword before, haven't you?#$r 847951 10 Event_Grave1#Yes, and it's exciting!#$r 847951 10 Event_Grave2#Yes, but only in self-defense#$r 847951 -100 Event_Grave3#Yes, but it's dangerous. You should stay safe.#$r 847951 0 Event_Grave4#No"/faceDirection Abigail 0/pause 2000/playMusic nightTime/speak Pierre "Abigail?!$4"/pause 100/faceDirection Abigail 2 true/faceDirection farmer 2 true/emote Abigail 16/speak Abigail "Dad?$7"/move Pierre -3 0 0/move Pierre 0 -4 3/faceDirection Abigail 1/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Pierre "I've been looking all over for you! Your mother wants you to come home and help with dinner!$u"/pause 300/faceDirection Pierre 2/pause 700/faceDirection Pierre 1/pause 700/faceDirection Pierre 3/pause 500/speak Pierre "What are you doing in the graveyard, anyway? This is no place for a young lady!$u#$b#It's bad enough that you're built like a football player.$u#$b#I don't need people gossiping about how my daughter snoops around grave yards as well!$u#$b#Think about how your mother would feel.$u"/faceDirection Abigail 3/emote Abigail 12/pause 400/faceDirection Abigail 1/speak Abigail "Mind your own business! You think I should be at home cooking dinner because I'm a girl!$a"/speak Abigail "When are you going to realize that's not the kind of woman I want to be?!$1"/showFrame Pierre 16/textAboveHead Pierre "...!"/faceDirection Abigail 2/speak Abigail "Let's get out of here, @.$a"/showFrame Pierre 0/move Abigail -1 0 2 true/faceDirection farmer 3/move Abigail 0 2 2/faceDirection farmer 2 true/move Abigail 0 3 2 true/faceDirection Pierre 2 true/pause 1000/pause 500/faceDirection Abigail 0/speak Abigail "Well, are you coming or not?$u"/pause 600/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/move farmer 0 8 2 true/move Abigail 0 4 1 false/move farmer 8 0 2 true/move Abigail 8 0 2 true/textAboveHead Pierre "Come back!"/globalFade/viewport -4000 0/pause 400/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 300/playSound leafrustle/pause 700/playSound leafrustle/pause 700/message "Okay, my dad won't find us here..."/speak Abigail "*sigh*... Can you believe my parents were ever young? They don't understand my perspective at all.$3#$b#I'm so dedicated to building my body, and improving my studies...$3#$b#I just wish they'd see that side of me. I'm not some little girl they need to protect anymore.$6#$b#I know, I know... they grew up in a different era, with different values. It still ticks me off sometimes, okay?$3"/pause 1000/speak Abigail "Well, thanks for hearing me out @.#$b#Um, now could you help untangle my hair from this bush?$h"/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 300/playSound leafrustle/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 200/playSound grassyStep/pause 400/playSound leafrustle/pause 300/playSound leafrustle/pause 600/end

Scared of some silly bats.$2#$b#All this useless brawn... And I just couldn't do it.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Abigail 3/speak Abigail "$q 34 null#I guess I'm not as tough as I thought...$2#$r 34 20 Event_Cave_1#You're safe with me.#$r 34 40 Event_Cave_2#I get scared too.#$r 34 -50 Event_Cave_3#You're crying like a little baby. Stop."/faceDirection Abigail 3/stopMusic/pause 1500/playMusic sadpiano/pause 1800/speak Abigail "@, I... I really like you...$4#$b#And not just as a friend. You know that, right?$4#$b#You've always encouraged me. You never judge me like my parents do.$4#$b#After I got to know you, I started feeling better and better about my life here.$4#$b#It's also obvious you dig buff chicks, so that's a plus.$8"/pause 1000/speak Abigail "I've waited too long to say this... But I can't keep it in anymore. I've felt this way for a long time.$l"/pause 1800/speak Abigail "I love you, @. *giggle*$4#$b#And I promise, to show you just how much I do from now on.$11"/pause 1000/showFrame Abigail 33/showFrame 101/pause 2500/speak Abigail "%Abigail's sudden embrace causes your heartbeat to skyrocket.#$b#%It feels like your heart could beat right out of your chest.#$b#%In a way this moment is both exhilarating and terrifying. More than any monster you've faced.#$b#%You don't want to mess this up. You care about Abigail too much.#$b#%You gently place your hands on abigail's hips to test the waters.#$b#%...She doesn't seem to mind.#$b#%As you ponder if it would be ok to be more aggressive, Abigail takes the initiative suddenly.#$b#%She grabs you by the wrists, and guides your hands to her ample breasts.#$b#%With that, your inhibitions are destroyed.#$b#%You greedily sink your fingers into her amazing chest.#$b#%Abigail lets out a soft moan, and moves her hands to your back, slowly working her way downward.#$b#%You guide the straps of her top over her enormous shoulders, freeing her breasts for you to touch directly.#$b#*giggle*I could tell you had a thing for my boobs.$15#$b#I'm pretty proud of them myself *giggle*.$15#$b#%Your hands return to her breasts. This time however you can feel her rolling her engorged pecs.#$b#%Each time she does so, you feel the steely muscles flex beneith her soft breasts.#$b#%This spectacle of complete muscle control has you completely in awe.#$b#%You reach up to feel those incredible pecs.#$b#%They're rock hard, and you can feel the striations beneath her skin.#$b#I'm glad you're enjoying yourself *giggle*.$14#$b#%Abigail's hands reach under your behind, and she suddendly lifts you up.#$b#% Your chest rests on her exposed breasts, and your nethers grind against her chiseled abs.#$b#%Abigail continues the passionate kiss, all while holding you up with her powerful arms.#$b#%You never want this moment to end.#$b#%But just as you're thinking that, you hear distant bat cries getting closer.#$b#As Much as I'm enjoying myself...$14#$b#...Maybe we should continue this later...$15#$b#%Abigail sets you down, and you both exchange a somewhat embarrassed smile.#$b#%You've known for a while, but never truly thought about it until now...#$b#%You know for certain that this is the woman you want to spend the rest of your life with."/pause 2500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.2/f Abigail 1000/w rainy/t 1200 1900/z w: AbigailFlute/-1000 -1000/farmer 34 32 1 Abigail 47 31 2/skippable/ambientLight 160 140 10/specificTemporarySprite abbyAtLake/animate Abigail false true 612 16 17 18 19/viewport 46 31 clamp true/pause 17900/move farmer 13 0 0/stopMusic/playMusic rain/pause 500/stopAnimation Abigail/faceDirection Abigail 2/emote Abigail 16/speak Abigail "$q 32 null#@! Why are you out here in the rain?$7#$r 32 0 Event_Rain_1#Just doing some work#$r 32 50 Event_Rain_2#Enjoying the weather#$r 32 10 Event_Rain_3#I could ask you the same question"/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 1250/speak Abigail "...I came here to spend some time alone.$8"/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1600/faceDirection Abigail 2/speak Abigail "But I don't mind your company!"/pause 500/emote Abigail 40/speak Abigail "You're getting soaked... come stand under the tree."/move farmer -1 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 2/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 3000/speak Abigail "I bet you didn't know I could play an instrument, huh?#$b#I bet most people think all I can do is heft weights around.$3#$b#...#$b#You know, I love moments like this.#$b#Watching the curtains of rain whisper above a silent lake.$8"/pause 650/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 600/playSound dwop/showFrame 98/pause 500/faceDirection Abigail 3/emote Abigail 16/pause 800/speak Abigail "Hey! A mini-harp!$h#$b#You're full of surprises, @. I'm impressed."/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 900/emote farmer 56/faceDirection Abigail 3/pause 700/faceDirection Abigail 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/showFrame Abigail 16/pause 500/showFrame 98/pause 2000/playMusic AbigailFluteDuet/pause 1250/animate Abigail false true 612 16 17 18 19/animate farmer false true 308 99 98 98 99 100 100/pause 10000/viewport move 1 0 18000/pause 20000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 2000/end

entries.Introduction: Hello! You must be @, the new farmer. I'm Caroline.#$e#My husband runs the general store here.#$b#And have you met my daughter, Abigail? She's the one with umm...$1#$b#the large physique and purple hair$2.
entries.Mon: I wish Abby wouldn't spend so much lifting weights.$2#$b#I just want a normal life for her.
entries.Mon_inlaw_Abigail: Hi, @. You make our daughter so happy.$1#$b#I'm so glad the two of you met!
entries.Mon8: #$1 Caroline23#When we first moved to Pelican Town I would take secret walks to the Wizard's tower. Don't tell Pierre, he has jealousy issues.#$e#Abigail was born about a year after we moved to Pelican Town. I wonder if she'll ever experience life outside the valley?
entries.Tue: I've seen wild horesradish in the forest.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
entries.Wed: Hi there. Do you have everything you need for the farm?#$e#If not, we might be able to help you out.#$e#We carry a variety of useful items.
entries.Thu: #$1 Caroline1#Hmmm... I wonder if I can get Pierre to cook dinner tonight.#$e#Hmmm... what am I going to make for dinner tonight?#$e#Maybe I'll just get take-out from the Saloon.
entries.Fri: It's a fine-looking day.#$e#On days like this I like to help Evelyn with the public gardens.#$e#She's strong for her age, but I think she appreciates all the help she can get.
entries.Sat: Is it just me, or does Abigail have an unhealthy interest in doom and gloom?#$b#She tends to get obsessed with things... like bodybuilding.$2#$b#I try to be supportive, but I worry.
entries.Sat_inlaw_Abigail: Dinner's been a lot quieter since Abigail moved out...#$e#I used to have to cook so much to keep her fed.#$b#But now we always have leftovers!*laugh*!$h
entries.Sat2: Abby's always had a strange interest in the occult. I'm not sure where she gets it from...
entries.Sat4: I once caught Abby watching a bodybuilding pageant on television.#$b#After that she was hooked.$2#$b#I really do admire her dedication, though I hope she doesn't hurt herself.
entries.Sat6: #$1 Caroline12#When we first moved here, I took a while to settle down... I wasn't ready for the domestic life.#$e#Pierre's a bit traditional... but he's a good man. He's ambitious, but he always puts his family first.
entries.Sun: Today I'm just going to relax and think positively.#$e#Do you ever take a day off?
entries.Wed6: Stardew Valley is nice, but I wish I knew more people.#$e#I'm glad that we've become friends.
entries.summer_Mon: On wednesdays the shop is closed.#$e#Keep that in mind if you're going to need anything.
entries.summer_Tue: Abigail says that today is a 'rest day'.#$b#I hope that means I don't have to cook as much tonight.
entries.summer_Wed: Hi there.#$b#We might be closed today, but be sure to stop by tomorrow if you need anything!
entries.summer_Sat: Abby has a fair complexion.#$b#It's tough for her during the summer, because she gets burned easily.
entries.summer_Sat_inlaw_Abigail: How's Abigail's health? She's always been such a pale girl. Hopefully the farm lifestyle puts a little color in her cheeks.
entries.summer_Sun: Today I'm just going to relax and think positively.#$e#Do you ever take a day off?
entries.summer_Wed6: Time seems to go by faster and faster the older you get...$s
entries.fall_Mon: Fall is Abby's favorite season.#$b#But that also means she works out twice as much.$2
entries.fall_Mon_inlaw_Abigail: Abby was taking online classes when she lived here, but I she didn't discuss it much...#$b#I think she likes building her body more than studying.#$b#She talks about you all the time though!$1#$b#You've made hr a very happy woman.
entries.fall_Tue: I wonder of I can sneak some mushrooms into tonight's dinner.#$b#Pierre and Abby aren't fans of mushrooms, but I found some really nice ones.#$b#Foraging can be really fun!$1
entries.fall_Sat: It's somewhat of a relief to hear Abby playing video games.#$b#It's probably the most 'normal' of her hobbies...$2
entries.fall_Wed6: You know, I used to want to be a farmer myself. Well, more like a rancher.#$e#I always loved movies about the wild west when I was a girl.
entries.winter_Tue: Winter is harsh, but you can dig up some roots if you're lucky.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
entries.winter_Fri: Even though it's cold, I still check on the public garden beds every now and then.#$e#I just want to make sure they aren't damaged too much before spring returns.
entries.winter_Sat: Don't you think Abby would look better with her natural hair color?#$e#She used to have light chestnut-colored hair.
entries.winter_Wed6: Are you excited for the new year?#$e#I predict that you'll be super-successful on your farm.$h

entries.Introduction: Hey, it's Mr. @, the new farmer! I'm Pierre, owner of the local general store.^Hey, it's Ms. @, the new farmer! I'm Pierre, owner of the local general store.#$b#If you're looking for seeds, my shop is the place to go. I'll also buy produce from you for a good price!#$e#A little agriculture could really inject new life into the local economy!
entries.cc_Complete: This is a dream-come-true! You can't begin to imagine how much stress JojaMart was causing me.#$e#For a small town like this, one store is enough! There's too much social pressure for me to overcharge, anyway.
entries.joja_Begin: This is a sad day for Pelican Town... The stronger Joja becomes, the closer I move toward bankruptcy. I might have to sell the shop soon...$s
entries.MovieInvitation: Hey, that's a great idea... It'll be nice to get out from behind the counter. I'll meet you there!
entries.Mon: Welcome! If you're looking for seeds, you've come to the right place!
entries.Mon_inlaw_Abigail: Hello, er... my son?$s^Hello, er... daughter?$s#$b#Sorry, still getting used to that.#$b#So how ar you?$1
entries.Mon4: Hi, @. Need any seeds or fruit tree saplings?
entries.Mon4_inlaw_Abigail: Hi, @. How's Abigail doing?#$b#We don't talk too much now that the two of you are married.$2#$b#I suppose she resents me.$2
entries.Tue: Sometimes I get new items in stock, so make sure to stop by every so often.#$e#It's a lot of work to run a shop.$h
entries.Tue6: Abigail practically eats us out of house and home.#$b#I used to be in shape, you know. I was a boxer back in my day!$1
entries.Wed: It's my day off today.#$e#Hmmm... what to do...$s
entries.Wed4: When I was younger I always had something interesting to do... now I find myself just wasting time whenever I'm not at work.$s
entries.Thu: I'm happy to buy any produce off you.#$b#I'll give you a fair price, of course!
entries.Thu2: I really do appreciate your business, Mr. @. I've been having a harder and harder time turning a decent profit.^I really do appreciate your business, Ms. @. I've been having a harder and harder time turning a decent profit.
entries.Thu8: Does Abigail look anything like me?#$b#I'm not talking about the muscles!$4#$b#Don't tell my wife, but sometimes I wonder if I'm really the father.$2#$b#Bah... I'm just being silly.
entries.Fri: #$1 pierreJoja#Business has been slow since Joja moved into town. It's hard to compete with their selection.$k$s#$e#Hi there. Is your farm doing well?#$e#Maybe a few of my seeds will spruce things up.
entries.Sat: If you find any wild produce, I'll take it off your hands for a reasonable price.
entries.Sat8: That girl...$3#$b#Abigail makes me so mad sometimes.$3#$b#I mean, why's a girl even interested in lifting weights anyway?$3#$b#...I guess I'm just worried.$2#$b#it's bothering Caroline too...$2
entries.Sun: #$1 pierreBlue#*sigh*... I've got those behind-the-counter blues...$k$s#$e#I wish I could go for a walk, but I can't leave the store unattended.#$e#I've heard the flowers are in bloom and the air smells great...$s
entries.Wed6: #$1 pierre1#*sigh*... No matter how well the business does, it's never enough to satisfy my desire for success. What's wrong with me? Maybe I'm just bored with domestic life.$s#$e#Some day I'm going to open a new shop in the city and make a killing.#$e#Unfortunately, business is so slow I can hardly save any money...$s
entries.Thu4: Hey, @. You're my number one customer!
entries.summer_Mon: I've got summer seeds available! You'd better stock up.
entries.summer_Wed: I'm so glad to have a day off from work.
entries.summer_Thu: Everyone's enjoying the weather instead of shopping... *sigh*
entries.summer_Fri: Oh, hi. Are you satisfied with the quality of my summer seeds?
entries.summer_Sat: Summer is a good time to eat a refreshing salad, don't you think?
entries.summer_Sun: Ugh... It's so hot in here.
entries.winter_Mon: You can't grow any crops during winter... so I have no seeds to offer you.#$e#It's really going to cut into our profits.
entries.winter_Wed: #$1 pierreDin#I'm going to surprise Caroline tonight with dinner and a bottle of Stardew Red. Don't tell anyone!$k#$e#Finally, a day of relaxation.
entries.winter_Thu: Hi. In the mood for a litle shopping?
entries.winter_Fri: I mainly deal in edibles, so if you've got any ores or wood you'd better try selling them somewhere else.
entries.winter_Sat: Is it just me or is there a cold draft in here?
entries.winter_Sun: If I didn't have this shop to run I would be outside right now.#$e#It would be fun to throw a snowball.
entries.fall_Mon: Fall seeds are here! Crops don't grow in winter so this is your last shot until spring.#$b#Better go all out, huh?
entries.fall_Thu: It's starting to get cold outside...#$b#That means more people come into the shop to warm up... hehe.
entries.fall_Fri: #$1 pierreMEGA#My dream is to keep opening new stores until I become extremely wealthy. hehehe.$k#$e#Hi there. Is your farm still doing well?#$e#Maybe a few of my seeds will spruce things up.$h
entries.fall_Sat: I'm happy to buy whatever you produce on the farm.#$e#Yes, I do resell it for a profit... but that's the benefit of being an established shop owner.#$e#Don't get any ideas...
entries.fall_Sun: If I didn't have this shop to run I would be outside right now...#$e#The leaves look great and the mushrooms are sprouting.
entries.Event_naga1: Thanks, I appreciate that. Just forget you ever saw this, okay?$h#$b#...And I'll just forget that you were snooping around in my bedroom!
entries.Event_naga2: You would really do that to me? You're terrible.$s#$b#You shouldn't have been snooping around in my bedroom in the first place! Nosy neighbors are the worst.$3
